feedback.feedbackString: Ti should be written from downleft to upright

misClassify.feedbackString: Ti and Pie looks similar. but Pie is top-down and right-left curve, and Ti is bottom-up and left-right line
misClassify.name: Pie

misClassify.feedbackString: Ti and Heng looks similar, Ti is not horizontal, but with some positive slope
misClassify.name: Heng
